long_description:
Do you enjoy tripping over doorsteps and breaking some bones? You don't? May I present you:

# Auto Door

Auto Door automatically opens and closes doors for players. You will no longer abuse pressure plates.

It does this by checking for doors every 0.2 seconds. That means the performance impact of this is per player and not per door.

Already open doors will not be closed and automatically opened doors will be automatically closed if the player moves away, leaves the server or the server shuts down.
name: auto_door
short_description: Automatically opens and closes doors for players
title: Automatic Door Opening and Closing
